title: Wharfie
creator_credit: Barbara Boyd-Anderson and A Fitzroy Flix Film
brief_description: Impressionistic, non-narrated study of Melbourne Waterfront in which and old ex-wharfie returns to the wharves with his grandson to be confronted by vast technological changes. Still photographs and newspaper headlines refer back to more boisterous days when the wharves employed many more men.
